=== Overview ===

The Ubuntu OpenStack team are responsible for delivery of OpenStack packages as part of every Ubuntu release, and backporting of each OpenStack release to Ubuntu LTS releases via the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/OpenStack/CloudArchive|Ubuntu Cloud Archive]]</nowiki> (UCA).

=== Packaging ===

==== Archives ====
